name: GitLab
description: Web-based DevOps platform that provides Git repository management with CI/CD pipelines, issue tracking, and extensive DevOps features in a complete application
pros: Single application for the entire software lifecycle
Strong CI/CD capabilities built directly into the platform
Better self-hosted support than many alternatives
More features in free tier compared to competitors
cons: UI can be complex with steep learning curve
Performance can be slower than some competitors
useCases: Secure DevOps with built-in security scanning

pricing.details: Free tier for basic features. Premium tier at $19/user/month, Ultimate tier at $99/user/month for advanced features and security.
